name: Pong (itch) (Jaspinder Dosanjh)
description:
Hey all,

I made a very simple 2D Pong clone using Unity 3D. I am an aspiring game developer and this is the first game I have ever made.

This game is written in Javascript and requires the Unity web-plugin for you to to play this. I will be releasing an update to this game in the near future that will allow you to play against a friend instead of the AI and an overall update to the in-game graphics used.

Controls

Move up: W

Move down: S
